评论概述: Costume pants for people as thin as a toothpick.
评论详情: I bought a LARGE pair, as someone who usually wears mediums, and im average sized, closer to skinny, not even overweight, and STILL this thing was SQUEEZING my waist. I tried wearing it for 10 minutes and I had to stop because it genuinely hurt to wear. I checked the tag too, it said it was a large, so I didn't even get the wrong size. These pants are only meant for people who are underweight, don't starve yourself to wear them just buy better pants.  To top it off, even if these fit, the polyester is so thin that it makes it feel like it's a part of a costume and not a real pair of pants. I returned mine, but these probably wouldn't last even if you kept them.

评论概述: VERY thin material, not worth it even as a cheap 'TRIPP' alternative
评论详情: Too small and they only go up to large, VERY very thin material that'll rip very easily, tiny/thin front pockets with no pockets on back, they have a line where real branded pants have a zip to make them into shorts, and it's just for show, they don't have a zip. Cheap cheap cheap quality. The material is SO THIN you can see right through it. The chains are chinsy. I can already tell the seams aren’t going to last. A large should have been plenty big enough but I could hardly button them. Not worth the cost for such bad quality. Don’t waste your money.

I'm amab and the large fits perfectly.  The material has that cheap polyester like feel and the chains are also very flimsy. The suspenders are also fixed in place and cannot be removed. Also there are only 3 belt loops??? Why cheap out on belt loops of all things?! Those are my only complaints.  They're TRIPP styled pants at a third of the price. You can't go wrong. And to be fair, TRIPP pants aren't known for their longevity.  Trying these on definitely took me back to 2004 when I got my first pair of bondage pants. Worth every penny.  Warning to baby goths: don't wear these too much. They are NOT made to last! Get a mesh bag to wash the pants in so they don't rip themselves apart in the washing machine.
